Name: sin-naseemismailand-la
Author: Naseem Ismail And Masoor Maulana, Kaleel

Translations.Text: (nabiye! abrahage) æt senava obage deviyan kese nam (vinasa) kara dæmuveda yanna oba (podiyak sita) bæluve nædda
ovunge kumantranaya ohu apate hæriye nædda
ovun kerehi paksin kandayam kandayam vasayen ohu yævuveya
(kæta gæsunu) pulussana lada kuda kal kæta, eva ovun mata visi karana ladi
emagin (paksin visin) kota kana lada karal men bavata pat kara, ovunva ohu (vinasa kara) dæmuveya
